attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Since the dawn of time, since the holy one decended and roamed our lands, we have been taught to honour, love and respect our parents.

Hence the annual holidays of Mothers Day and Father's Day.

Then were was Grandparents day, so in effect, they get two holidays for their status. But what about the uncles??

Where is our day? 

Are we no less important? 

Do we not support, love and honour our kin the same? 

Should we not get our reward for buying mulitple presents for our brothers and sisters families and only get one in return??

I put it to you, the masses of Uncles to pledge your support to grant our cause the audience and reward it deserves!!!

We fight for our freedom, we fight for our honour. For we don't just fight for our Uncle Day, we fight our justice!! For this is our, Secondary Carer Day!!!

Aunties can have one too, but they should start their own!! It is the Noughties after all!!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
